LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.GoogleMerchantCenter
LocaleResource.Value: Allows you to export product data in the feed format of Google Merchant Center (GMC).

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Feeds.GoogleMerchantCenterProductXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in XML feed format of Google Merchant Center (GMC).

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
• Either the GTIN (such as UPC, EAN, etc.) or manufacturer and manufacturer part number (MPN) are required for product identification. Google recommends that all three pieces of information be specified.
  • Specify default tax and shipping values in your Google Merchant Center account settings.
  • In order to get more info about required fields look at the following article Product feed specification.
  • You can find a list of all Google categories here.

LocaleResource.Name: DefaultValueSettingsNote
LocaleResource.Value: Default values will be exported if the information does not exist or is not available for a particular product. For a particular product, these values can be edited in the plugin configuration and the product edit page.

LocaleResource.Name: MissingDefaultCategory
LocaleResource.Value: Default Google category is not set

LocaleResource.Name: DefaultGoogleCategory.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Will be used if there is no category specified on produkt level.

LocaleResource.Name: Products.GoogleCategory.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the Google category corresponding to the product. Mandatory.

LocaleResource.Name: AdditionalImages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the box if you want to export more than one image. Up to 10 are possible.

LocaleResource.Name: SpecialPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to export special price and special price period.

LocaleResource.Name: Gender.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Required for particular products, for example clothes.

LocaleResource.Name: AgeGroup.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Required for particular products, for example clothes.

LocaleResource.Name: Color.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Required for particular products, for example clothes.

LocaleResource.Name: Size.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Required for particular products, for example clothes.

LocaleResource.Name: Material.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The material or fabric that a product is made out of. Usefull for clothes for instance.

LocaleResource.Name: Pattern.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The pattern or graphic print featured on a product. Usefull for clothes for instance.

LocaleResource.Name: SearchIsTouched.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Searches for records which have or have not been edited yet.

LocaleResource.Name: ExpirationDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of days after products should expire or no longer appear. A value of 0 causes that no expiry date will be exported.

LocaleResource.Name: ExportShipping.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to export the weight of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: ExportBasePrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Activate this option if you want to export the base price of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: Multipack.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Number of identical products in a merchant defined multipack. Must be greater than 1.

LocaleResource.Name: IsBundle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Merchant defined product package consisting of one main and several accessories or add-ons.

LocaleResource.Name: IsAdult.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Product, which is intended only for adult users.

LocaleResource.Name: EnergyEfficiencyClass.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The energy efficiency class of the product in accordance with EU directive 2010/30/EU. Possible values are G, F, E, D, C, B, A, A +, A++, A+++.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomLabel0.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom label 0 serves the individual grouping of products.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomLabel1.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom label 1 serves the individual grouping of products.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomLabel2.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom label 2 serves the individual grouping of products.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomLabel3.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom label 3 serves the individual grouping of products.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomLabel4.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom label 4 serves the individual grouping of products.
